mapper.select: select m.id,l.title,l.fileName, d.dname from listen_lecture ll, lecture l,detail_categorie d, member m where m.id = ll.id and ll.lecture_id = l.lecture_id and l.detail_num = d.detail_num and m.id = #{id}

select w.wish_list_id, w.id,l.lecture_id, l.title, l.price, l.discount, l.level, l.fileName, t.teacher_name, c.cname, d.dname from wish_list w ,lecture l, teacher t, categorie c, detail_categorie d, listener li, review r where t.teacher_id = l.teacher_id and c.categorie_num = l.categorie_num and d.detail_num = l.detail_num and r.lecture_id = l.lecture_id and li.listener_id = r.listener_id and l.lecture_id = w.lecture_id and w.id = #{id} group by w.wish_list_id;
select count(1) from wish_list where id = #{id} and lecture_id = #{lecture_id};
mapper.delete: delete from wish_list where lecture_id = #{lecture_id} and id = #{id};
